main event: On March 30, 1966, in Beverly Shores, Indiana, an observer watched an unusual light which led to the appearance of two figures and a hovering object.
interesting points: The object was first mistaken for an unusual star with no other stars visible., The observer described the object as having long pointed things around it and approximately 15x5 ft. in diameter., The object landed near the observer's home and rose again after a few minutes., Witnesses reported a bright red light plane descending in the area during the sighting., A police chief nearby claimed to have photographed two saucers at the same time.
sighted object: A large round light with long pointed features
witness description: A civilian describable as a potentially concerned individual who contacted authorities regarding the sighting.
